trans-unit.source: Provides methods used to render a track bar control with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 提供用來呈現具有視覺化樣式之追蹤列控制項的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer> class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render each part of a track bar control with the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer>類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現追蹤列控制項的每個部分，與目前作業系統的視覺化樣式的方法。

trans-unit.source: Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control.
trans-unit.target: 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 這非常有用，如果要繪製的自訂控制項，應該具有目前的視覺化樣式外觀。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods in this class will draw the track bar with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的工作區，此類別中的方法將會繪製具有追蹤列目前的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the methods in this class will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，此類別中的方法將會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，您可以檢查的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class wraps the functionality of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType> that is set to one of the elements exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會包裝的功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType>設定為其中一個項目所公開<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer> methods to draw a horizontal track bar that responds to mouse clicks.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用的自訂控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer>繪製回應按下滑鼠的水平的追蹤列的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the track bar slider.
trans-unit.target: 繪製追蹤列滑桿所用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the track bar slider.
trans-unit.target: 指定追蹤列滑桿繫結的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the track bar slider.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState" /> 值，指定追蹤列滑桿的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: Draws a downward-pointing track bar slider (also known as the thumb) with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 繪製具有視覺化樣式的下指 (Downward-Pointing) 追蹤列滑桿 (也稱為捲動方塊)。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 使用者已停用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the track bar slider.
trans-unit.target: 繪製追蹤列滑桿所用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the track bar slider.
trans-unit.target: 指定追蹤列滑桿繫結的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the track bar slider.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState" /> 值，指定追蹤列滑桿的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: Draws a horizontal track bar slider (also known as the thumb) with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 繪製具有視覺化樣式的水平追蹤列滑桿 (也稱為捲動方塊)。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 使用者已停用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the ticks.
trans-unit.target: 繪製刻度所用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the ticks.
trans-unit.target: 指定刻度範圍的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of ticks to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的刻度數目。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EdgeStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EdgeStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified number of horizontal track bar ticks with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 繪製具有視覺化樣式之指定數目的水平追蹤列刻度。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: If width or height of the bounding rectangle or the number of ticks is less than or equal to zero, or `g` is `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.DrawHorizontalTicks%2A> returns without rendering.
trans-unit.target: 如果寬度或高度，這個周框的刻度數目小於或等於零，或`g`是`null`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.DrawHorizontalTicks%2A>傳回而不會轉譯。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.target: 使用者已停用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.target: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the track.
trans-unit.target: 繪製追蹤所用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the track.
trans-unit.target: 指定追蹤範圍的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the track for a horizontal track bar with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 繪製具有視覺化樣式之水平追蹤列的追蹤。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.DrawHorizontalTrack%2A> method in a custom control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method to draw a track bar.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.DrawHorizontalTrack%2A>中自訂控制項的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>繪製追蹤列的方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.DrawTopPointingThumb%2A> method in a custom control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method to draw an upward-pointing track bar slider.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.DrawTopPointingThumb%2A>中自訂控制項的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法繪製向上追蹤滑桿列。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer> class.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the track bar slider.

trans-unit.source: Returns the size, in pixels, of the track bar slider (also known as the thumb) that points down.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指向下方之追蹤列滑桿 (也稱為捲動方塊) 的大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the size, in pixels, of the slider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指定滑桿的大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The size of the slider is determined by the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 滑桿的大小取決於目前作業系統的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 使用者已停用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> this operation will use.
trans-unit.target: 此作業將使用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the slider.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState" /> 值，指定滑桿的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size, in pixels, of the track bar slider (also known as the thumb) that points to the left.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指向左方之追蹤列滑桿 (也稱為捲動方塊) 的大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the size, in pixels, of the slider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指定滑桿的大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The size of the slider is determined by the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 滑桿的大小取決於目前作業系統的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState" /> 值，指定滑桿的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size, in pixels, of the track bar slider (also known as the thumb) that points to the right.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指向右方之追蹤列滑桿 (也稱為捲動方塊) 的大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the size, in pixels, of the slider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指定滑桿的大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.target: 滑桿的大小取決於目前作業系統的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 使用者已停用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。

Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> this operation will use.
trans-unit.target: 此作業將使用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState" /> 值，指定滑桿的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size, in pixels, of the track bar slider (also known as the thumb) that points up.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指向上方之追蹤列滑桿 (也稱為捲動方塊) 的大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the size, in pixels, of the slider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指定滑桿的大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.target: 滑桿的大小取決於目前作業系統的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.GetTopPointingThumbSize%2A> method to determine the size of the rectangle used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.DrawTopPointingThumb%2A> method to draw the slider.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.GetTopPointingThumbSize%2A>方法來判斷所使用的矩形大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.DrawTopPointingThumb%2A>繪製滑桿的方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer>類別。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 使用者已停用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer" /> class can be used to draw a track bar with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer" /> 類別是否可用來繪製具有視覺化樣式的追蹤列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者在作業系統中已經啟用視覺化樣式，而且應用程式視窗的工作區中已經套用視覺化樣式，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, the methods of this class will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`false`，這個類別的方法將會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property to determine whether to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性來判斷是否要使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer>類別。
